summary: Second round testing after cart bug fix attempt. Backend APIs remain 100% functional (15/15 tests passed). Frontend cart functionality still broken - cart count not updating when clicking add buttons. Authentication flow has form interaction issues preventing complete cart testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Form field targeting issues - input selectors not working consistently
ui_bugs.details: Unable to fill registration form fields using standard selectors. May need data-testid attributes or different targeting approach.

integration_issues.issue: Add to cart functionality completely broken - cart count stays at 0
integration_issues.details: Cart count does not increase when clicking add buttons. Previous report mentioned count updated but items array empty - now count doesn't update at all. Functional setState fix appears unsuccessful.

integration_issues.issue: Authentication state not persisting properly for cart operations
integration_issues.details: Cart page requires login even after successful authentication. Cannot complete full cart flow testing due to auth issues.

passed_tests: Backend: All 15 API endpoints working perfectly
Frontend: Homepage loading with hero section
Frontend: Cart page routing (shows login requirement)

success_percentage.frontend: 40% (6/10 major features working, critical cart bug not fixed)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Cart functionality still broken after attempted fix. Add to cart buttons not working - cart count stays at 0. Need to debug CartContext addToCart function and ensure proper event handling. Also fix authentication state persistence and form field targeting for registration/login flows. The functional setState pattern fix did not resolve the issue.
